summary: Please put a new version into the market

comments.content:
There are two versions of Osmdroid in the Google market.
One is outdated and another one seems to have an invalid signature.

Please put a new version of Osmdroid into the market.

I don't have the control to remove the old version. The latest has a valid signature, but if you previously installed your own debug build then you'll need to uninstall that first.

I'm on vacation this week. I'll see about doing a new build next week.
This issue was closed by revision r932.
